title: Results on normal harmonic and $\varphi$-normal harmonic mappings
authors: Nikhil Bharti and Nguyen Van Thin
abstract:
In this paper, we study the concepts of normal functions and $\varphi$-normal
functions in the framework of planar harmonic mappings. We establish the
harmonic mapping counterpart of the well-known Zalcman-Pang lemma and as a
consequence, we prove that a harmonic mapping whose spherical derivative is
bounded away from zero is normal. Furthermore, we introduce the concept of the
extended spherical derivative for harmonic mappings and obtain several
sufficient conditions for a harmonic mapping to be $\varphi$-normal.
